text: This is a list of lighthouses in Brazil. They are located along the Atlantic coastline and islands of Brazil. These are named landfall lights, or those with a range of over twenty-five nautical miles. ==Lighthouses== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#dfdfdf" !
